mapper.sql: id, sort, dict_label, dict_value, `status`, dict_type, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user
mapper.select:
select sdd.id,sdd.sort,sdd.dict_label,sdd.dict_value,sdd.create_time, sdd.update_time,sdd.status,su.nick_name as createUserName,sdd.status, su1.nick_name as updateUserName,sdy.dict_name as dictTypeName from sys_dict_data sdd left join sys_dict_type sdy on sdy.id = sdd.dict_type left join sys_user su on su.id = sdd.create_user left join sys_user su1 on su1.id = sdd.update_user
and sdd.dict_type = #{dictType}
and sdd.dict_label like concat('%',#{dictLabel},'%')
and sdd.status = #{status}
and date_format(sdd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(sdd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
order by sdd.sort desc,sdd.create_time desc
